abstract: Robert Jeffress, a Baptist pastor from Dallas, introduced Gov. Rick Perry at a conservative forum, and then spoke off the cuff to reporters.
snippet: Robert Jeffress, a Baptist pastor from Dallas, introduced Gov. Rick Perry at a conservative forum, and then spoke off the cuff to reporters.
lead_paragraph: A Baptist pastor from Dallas who has endorsed Rick Perry introduced the Texas governor at a conservative forum on Friday in Washington, then later told reporters that Mormonism -- the religion of Mitt Romney, Mr. Perry's main rival for the Republican presidential nomination -- was a cult.
